description: This HTML file is the main entry point for a database viewer application. It consists of a layout that allows users to browse tables and data from connected databases, featuring a sidebar for database selection and a content area for displaying table data.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for the selected database and displays them in the UI.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for the selected table and displays it in the content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the data in a tabular format with HTML.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Formats an individual cell value for display.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands a cell in the table to show more detailed content.
